title: Cannot Load up client please help
body:
Hello i have re downloaded league of legends and cant seem to get the launcher to work, its coming up with repairing and just shows the splash art of league of legends then disappears,on task manager disappears aswel , ive turned off anti virus,changed fire wall settings, cleaned computer of any kind of league folder /file, tried e and c drives, ive tried your hextech repair tool and thats coming up with not responding,tried administrator on the installer and the client, the only thing i have found is this in logs but dont know anything about this stuff 
please can somebody give me advice on what to do

replies.body: These specifics logs aren't telling me a lot, but the issue generally sounds like a security setting blocking proper installation, repair, and launch.  The steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help.  If not, grab the logs collected from the HRT and attach them to a ticket so our tech team can take a closer look with you.
